alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 31 at 8:15AM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain and drizzle with additional ice accumulations of a glaze. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Price County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM CDT this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
